description:
The battle begins for possession of the Baratie, with Zeff leading the cooks against Krieg`s pirates. Luffy and crew join the fray, but things aren`t looking too good!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Explosion de coups de pied ! Sanji Vs Pearl Bouclier d`Acier
Hissatsu Ashiwaza Sakuretsu! Sanji VS Teppeki no Pearl
The Deadly Foot Technique Bursts Forth! Sanji vs. the Invincible Pearl!
Взрыв убийственной техники ножного боя! Санджи против неприступного Перла
เปิดฉาดวิชาผู้ใช้เท้า! ซันจิปะทะกำแพงเหล็ก ปาลู!
必殺足技炸裂! サンジVS鉄壁のパール
